name: Tasty Ramen
description:
You sneaked into a ramen storage room to steal delicious cup ramen, however the brands very own mascot is patrolling and nobody can tell what it will do to you, once it finds you... 

Mouse - Look Around

W/A/S/D/ - Move

Hold Shift - Run

This game started as an entry for #ScreamSolstice and it is in a very unfinished state right now. However, I am going to develop this further because I took a liking to the main character and I have quite some ideas I want to do with it.

- The music is "Trouble in the garden" by Augmentality (Brandon Morris)

- Sounds by satanicupsman and qubodup.
